title: Trial at Nuremberg. Facing judgement.
brief_description: This video documents the trial of 21 German war criminals at Nuremberg over a period of 217 days from November 1945-1946. This film describes the events at the end of the Second World war leading up to the trials. “Facing judgement” is a Movietone newsreel following the trial of Adolph Eichmann in Israel in 1961 for crimes committed during the Second World War.
